title: Brand New Bellevue Luxury Homes | Now Pre-Leasing up to 4 Weeks Free!!
posting_body: Find your serenity within at Surrey on Main.
Caught between urban and residential Bellevue, Surrey on Main is a haven for those who live here.
Color and white space balance for inspiration and relaxation simultaneously.
History hidden in plain sight rewards curiosity while everyday elegance creates a sanctuary in our busy, bustling world.
Inside each home, warm, wood-style plank flooring juxtaposes tones of gray and black in the quartz countertops, black metal accents, and dark pendant lights.
A canvas of clean lines and warm light, the space is waiting to become your own.
Surrey on Main’s community spaces are plush and polished, but you’re still free to put your feet up after a long walk.
After all, this is your sanctuary.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 702 Sq.
****Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
